alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Red River; Sabine; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 9:12PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Webster, De Soto, northwestern Red River, southeastern Caddo, central Bienville, southeastern Bossier, northwestern Sabine Parishes in northwestern Louisiana and northeastern Shelby Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 912 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Doyline to 6 miles southwest of Joaquin. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Logansport, Ringgold, Joaquin, Heflin, Huxley, South Mansfield, Hall Summit, Castor, Grand Cane, Bienville, Jamestown, Bryceland, Stanley, Mount Lebanon, Carmel, Curtis, Grand Bayou, Kingston and Plum Orchard Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northwestern Louisiana...and eastern and northeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Red River; Sabine; Webster
